The general school number is 507-214-6300. While the greeting message is playing enter the four digit extension of the party you want to reach. If you do not enter an extension the call will be forwarded to the district office.
Fax number: 507-451-6474
Mailing Address:
Medford Public Schools
750 2nd Avenue SE
Medford, MN 55049

span.span: We have one school facility, which opened in 2003 and houses both Medford Elementary and Medford High School.

br.span: The mission of Medford Public School is to provide quality education and prepare our children and community for the future.
